metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36024 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in freedesktop poppler version 20.12.1, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (DoS) via crafted .pdf file to FoFiType1C::convertToType1 function.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-36024` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 22.12.0-2ubuntu1.1
libpoppler-cpp0v5 - 22.12.0-2ubuntu1.1
libpoppler-glib8 - 22.12.0-2ubuntu1.1
libpoppler-qt5-1 - 22.12.0-2ubuntu1.1
libpoppler-qt6-3 - 22.12.0-2ubuntu1.1
libpoppler126 - 22.12.0-2ubuntu1.1
poppler-utils - 22.12.0-2ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: poppler package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '22.12.0-2ubuntu1.1').
